Title: Enacts the geothermal education and outreach (GEO) act
Summary: Directs NYSERDA to develop a geothermal education and outreach program to provide guidelines, planning, and financial support for qualified school districts that wish to convert to a geothermal energy system as their primary source of energy.
LawCode: Add ยง1872-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to enacting the "geothermal education and outreach (GEO) act"
